name: SZAR
description: SZAR is a memecoin issued on the KASPA network using the KRC20 standard, designed to fill the gap in the KASPA ecosystem's blockchain gaming sector. The project follows the principle of equal opportunity and integrates deeply with gaming. With features such as a fair launch with 0% presale and no airdrops, multiple games and a rich, immersive narrative - it has quickly gained popularity across the KRC20 community.
